snippet.title: HELLFIRE RAMPAGE VR - Official HQ Gameplay Trailer | PCVR
snippet.description:
HELLFIRE RAMPAGE VR is an action-based combat game that blends shooting and melee fighting mechanics.

LORE:
You are a genius portal inventor who has detected an abnormal signal from another world.
After investigating, you discover that hellish creatures are collecting magical crystal essences and preparing to invade the HUMANITY

GAMEPLAY:
Use your primary ability to slow time and perform a dash jump.
Spam it every second, as the primary mechanic it helps you to aim enemies and protect yourself from sudden attacks.

ENEMIES:
Most dangerous hellish hordes actively grow their army.
Skeletons, imps, demons, hounds and ravens, summon kings and skull queens will not be an easy target to eliminate.
All of they have own fighting style, powers and weaknesses !

WEAPONS:
Wide arsenal of non-trivial and interesting guns are ready to serve you.
Find more then 30 melee and shooting tools to destroy the evil.
Take common, harded, epic and legendary guns as a loot from adversaries!

MISSION:
Find and return back all crystals essences, collect glove skins and try to pass 70+ challenges prepared for you !

Full game is created solo by a professional game developer.
Author's ideas with no any censure and restrictions combined into an actually trilling and hardcore VR experience.

The game is available for most popular VR platforms !
Meta Quest 2/3/3s, HTC VIVE, PSVR2, VALVE INDEX and other devices with OpenXR support !

Run the game via Steam 
Check the official store page :
https://store.steampowered.com/app/3010140

Game release coming soon
